content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10:25pm tuesday, july 26th i exited the front door of my home which is located in east-central indiana; the front door of which faces north. immediately as i exited my home i saw a bright light which was of a single color in appearance (yellow), this light was larger in relation to the background stars and fell from the sky in what i would personally and possibly naively speculate to be a normal rate of descension.  upon falling the object made no sound and appeared eliptical in its descent... i believe that the object itself was spherical or circular, but that in it's descending motion appeared eliptical to me.  this lasted just 15 or 20 seconds... the object from what i could tell continued to fall to earth, but my view was obstructed by the house accross the street, i walked to my driveway after i lost sight of this to try and find a better vantage point, but by that time the object was gone... i heard no sounds in relation to it and could see no visual reminance of the object by looking to the horizon.  i wonder if anyone else has seen this or anything similar in the area recently... i live in a pretty small community which is always pretty quiet at night, however in the past 2 days upon sitting on the front porch at night i have heard a lot of air traffic ( helicopters to be specific ) which is odd.... i wonder if there is any correlation between that and what i saw.
content.summary: Unknown object fell from sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the car in my driveway with one of my friends at around 3:30 or 4:00 am. i just looked into the skay and there was a red light that caught my attention coming up from behind the trees in my yard,it was like a round light hovering and moving more my way, i told my friend and he started looking, i watched it and looked like it dropped something little? and then started moving again it almost looked like it was shaking, the lights around got dim then i asked my friend if he seen something drop and he didnt but he seen the light, i got scared and couldent keep my eyes off of it and knew what it was. as we were recording it would stop.... nd hover it hid behind the tree a lil but still were i could see it sitting there. after about 15 mins of watching it move around back and fourth, it turned white and was blinking brighter, the light got bigger and turned orange and dropped to the ground the light got smaller as it went down, it was gone. i couldent beleive what i just saw, im scared still. i feel i need to talk to someone about it. i never knew... and i wanna know what happend and what was it really?
content.summary: Red light that was big, turned white and dropped to the ground (fern creek)

content.detailedDescription: While painting the house roof and looking north,i glimpsed a very rapidly moving, black pipelike object moving from west to east.I did have a camera with me but didn't have the time to get a picture as the transit lasted just a few seconds. i was left with an after image of the black pipe which lasted for about fifteen to thirty  seconds.On each end of the object i noticed cube like bump outs on opposite ends and on opposite sides.
content.summary: Black cylinder cube bumpout at each end, but on opposite sides

content.detailedDescription: i started sky watching at aruond 2:00am this morning after only 5:min i cought sight of a triangle formation traveling at a good clip when one of the corners sepperated while leaving the other two stationary after dooing a couple of lardge arcs it left the area i couldn't figure out the shapes of the crafts. i had a good feeling it was going to be a good morning. my wife who thinks i am crazy & never goes out viewing with me and allsoe thinks i'm full of **** finally gave in and decided to spend some time with me she got the suprize of her life after only 5 min 2 craft approached us at about 40 mph and a height of only 500 ft approx they decided to park almost directly overhead 2 beautafull  saucers one approx 70 ft and the other about 30 ft across they stayed till around 6:00am this was whitnessed allsoe by 2 of my children 23 yrs & 14 yrs and some of my early riseing neighbors
content.summary: I started sky watching at aruond 2:00 am this morning after only 5:min i cought sight of a tryangle formation traveling at a good clip when one of the corners sepperated while leaving the other two stationary

content.detailedDescription: Brother inlaw and myself went hunting for raccoon saw lite shining thru trees thot it was just the moonafter a while started walking up to my mothers house felt like somethging was following us we turned and saw this weird object just hovering above the corn field no sound but huge lite shining from front of objectscared but curious enuff to make sure wot we were seeing broke out in a cold sweat but walked close enuff to touch it if i chose to next time i remember we were just standing up from sitting next to barn and saw the object slowly drifting back towards the woods as if we had just seen it for the first time a time loss apparently cant say for sure we ran to house and told wot we saw my mom brother inlaw and sister stood by the back fence looking toward the woods a flash shot up from where we were looking and it was gone my mom called neighbor up the road to ask if they saw anything lady said she did not but that her husband had just lost his eyesight 20 min earlier his site returned ther shortly after i was home on leave from the servikce at the time my brother inlaw never spoke of it since then  he became very  scared wen the subject was brought up he took his own life several years later in 1984 i answered an ad in our local paper asking info on ufo sightings a couple weeks later a letter came to me saying mr weber i believe was his name said mr weber had become very ill after he read my story it stated he could not respond back to me also saying there was a very dark cloud over my head? from that point on i became a believer as in the past before i did not believe in such things.My story is true and am willing to take lie detector test or hypnosis i know wot i saw!
content.summary: Cobalt blue in color

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and my friend was in the passenger seat. she asked me what the bright light in the sky was and i said probably a light on top of a building (because it was just a big speck of light way off) and she said no, i suggested a plane (at this point i could see the row of lights getting bigger)because we live near an airport, but when i looked at it i realized it wasnt a plane. ive seen a lot of planes coming in at night and this didnt resemble any kind of landing lights or gear. it goes over us and she freaks out and tells me to look out my window. i do and just know this is not a plane or blimp or anything. it was way too quiet. i see there is and upper deck with a light and a horizontal row of 4 or 5 super bright lights on the front. with a red blinking light on the bottom or back. she said when she looked up at it it had 3 lights, one on each corner and loose s shaped arms going from the center with those lights on each end. in the center there was a circle of lights and she said it was so low to the ground she could she the lights moving across the ground towards us. and at one point the center lit up and moved around like a dimmer hazy blue version of a spot light. we were going to stop to get a better look at it, but when we turned around to track it in the sky it had disappeared. it was very fast moving towards us, slow when moving over us and fast again when it passed us. there was no sound indicating engines or anything similar. it was silent and smoothly going through the sky not even like there was wind resistance. we both felt such a strange feeling when it was near us. and were both itchy and had nausea after.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
This is a report about something i could not identify in the sky.  all times are in local edt.

i have been increasingly interested in this epidemic as of late.  i have also been sending out thoughts and hopes of contact more and more, as i have been moving more towards love.  last night (26jul11), just before midnight i was with 2 friends, at buttonville airport in markham. one of my friends noticed a satellite moving west though the big dipper, and tried to point it out, saying that as she did, she lost it.  i noted that i had never seen a satellite in that much light pollution, and she agreed it was very rare and difficult.  i thought i saw a flash for a moment as i was looking for it, but dismissed it. 

about 1/2 hour later i was in the office doing paperwork (working overnight ground crew for buttonville airport), and took a moment to send out some positive vibes, and hope.  as i did, i noticed that there was a plane taxiing in, and my co-worker (friend #2 from before) was working on the ramp.  i considered that if my "call" had been "heard", witnesses would decrease probability of any possible response, and the thought came to me, that the cessna might, but my somewhat like-minded colleague and friend might not, as much.

at just after 0200, now 27jul11, we put the movie, falling down, on and watched it to completion (it was a slow night). afterwards we went out for a cigarette at 0440.  we were just finishing our smokes, when my friend asked if the bright star in the east, near the moon was venus, i shared how someone had actually told me it was jupiter, during last year's august meteor shower, when i saw a shooting star go just above that "star", from south to north.  i verbalized my experience, as my friend said "what's that?"  i started about the shooting star, and he said, "no that's not a shooting star, it's blinking!  look!".  he was looking at another spot, further south, by maybe 2 feet at arms length in the night sky.  i looked and saw a blinking, clear white light.  we immediately thought it was no airplane as we are used to looking into the night sky for inbound aircraft, and the time between flashes was maybe triple what we would expect from any aircraft, and the blink lasted too long, fading in and out, too slowly as well (maybe 3 seconds between flashes lasting 1/4-1/2 second each).  it was moving in a southerly direction, sort of up and to the right away from "the bright star" in the east.  i looked back to the bright star describing my shooting star effect, and he said he saw that it was a bug, moving in the airport beacon.  as this exchange took place, the flashing stopped.  

we went to perform some of our duties, to prepare for morning, and i thought to the cosmos that i would try again, when i am in new brunswick, soon, and hoped what i might have seen, would appear again.  as i was fueling a plane, a few minutes later, which was from 0404-0422, 3/4 done, or so, i stopped for one last look into the sky.  i was facing east again.  i looked at the bright star, and then was drawn to another one to the right.  when i looked what i seem to remember is a light that was slightly taller than it was wide (1:2), about 1cm long at arms length, which extinguished in about 1/8 of a second, immediately as i looked towards it from the outside in (top/bottom to center), as if moving very rapidly, directly away from me, as i personally analyse, now.  this was comparable to watching a light bulb filament swith off.  perhaps an optical illusion after being fixed on the other star, but didn't "feel" like it, and i couldn't "see" it when i closed my eyes.  i chuckled and said, out loud, "now you're just [playing] with me".  i have been in a state of excited joy ever since.

i met back up with my friend, and asked him what he thought that first light was, not sharing the second, so we analysed.  in addition to the blink pattern, he, who watched it longer than i, said that it seemed to move faster with the light off, than on, as we could see aircraft like movement in the light, but it seemed to move too far for that speed, before blinking again.  we think that may be an illusion based on the pattern itself (our eyes are trained to look for the next flash of an aircraft at a certain relative point).  we ruled out civil aircraft, as it stopped blinking, essentially disappearing on such a clear night.  i asked him about what shape he saw, or multiples, and he remembered a typical flashing bulb as did i, but something told me it was more of a hollow circle.  we thought of military aircraft, but the light seemed to be very bright, and clear, suggesting it would be close, and any military aircraft we know of, we presumed we would hear, at the distance that that would suggest (maybe 20000 feet at 20 miles?  we heard nothing).  we looked up the location of the space station, and noticed it might have been in the vicinity, but was moving in the wrong trajectory (what i found online, might have just been the nearest satellite at the time, com to think of it).  we also noted that we wouldn't expect flashing lights, like those, from that, or any other kind of satellite.  we tried to think of other explanations, but came up empty.

this is going to bother me.  if nothing else, i hope someone can convince me of what it was i saw.  "normal", or not.
content.summary: I consciously hoped, then soon saw this... possibly twice... maybe thrice, last night

content.detailedDescription:
It was the first very cold blustery night of the year - november 16, 1999 - i was returning something to k-mart about 7:20 p.M.  i usually take my time leaving the house, making certain i have everything i need because i live quite far out in the country.  in hindsight, on that particular night i left the house very quickly - almost bolting out of the house; and i have no idea why i did that because i was only returning a pair of underwear to the store.  if i had left 20 seconds later i would have missed what i was about to see.  i was in my pickup truck, pulled out of the driveway heading west.  in the western horizon i saw a very bright yellow light appeared; then two and three and so on until there were eight. my first quick  thought was that they were landing lights from a plane until i started seeing more and realized how big these lights were.  i immediately pulled off to the side of the road, turned off my radio, and stuck my head out the window. there were large orbs about the color of the moon.  at first count there were seven; but after recounting i���m positive there were eight orbs.  as fast as i counted the eight orbs, they had traveled across the sky in 20-30 seconds until they disappeared.  the eight orbs took up almost ��� of the entire sky as they traveled.  they were in-line and did not change their positions but weren���t spaced evenly apart.  there were 2 - then a gap, then 3 - then a gap then 2 - another gap, then 1. the last orb was a little higher than all the others. as they passed over the field, they were approx. 300 yards away and 300-500 ft in altitude.

my first solid impression was that this was a controlled flight and not anything man-made.  there was no propulsion sound or sonic boom which i thought there would have been for something traveling as fast as they did.  immediately after they disappeared from sight i turned my truck around and followed where i thought they may have crashed; expecting to see a police road block or flames.  after seeing nothing for a few miles, i decided to go to my friends��� house to tell them what had just happened.  when i arrived jim and laura were reading.  they knew something was wrong as soon as they saw me.  i told them what happened and talked jim into coming with me to investigate where these orbs may have gone.  we went back to my house where i had first seen them in the sky - then drove east about 5 miles and didn���t see any sign of a crash.  i took jim back to his house and talked for awhile; then proceeded to k-mart.  i felt as though the cashier must have known something was wrong because i must have been very wide-eyed after seeing such an unusual thing.  when i returned home i called channel 4 news to ask if anyone else had reported anything strange in the sky.  the answer was no.  i went on-line and reported it on the ufo alert website.  while searching that website i found an astronomy student at the university of toronto.  i contacted him through his e-mail and he told me he had seen 7 orbs at the same time and place in the sky - he described them just as i had seen them.  we wrote back and forth a few times but then lost touch.  i no longer know how to contact him.  the next night i went bowling with my friend ken.  when i told him this story his jaw dropped because ken told me that earlier that day one of his employees sat him down and told him the exact same story i just told him. this employee lived in akron, n.Y.   the only difference was that his employee only saw 3-4 orbs.  ken gave me his employee���s phone number and we talked on the phone a few times.  i no longer have his correct phone number but will contact ken and ask him to try and get in touch with this man to see if he would be willing to talk to mufon field investigators about his sighting.
this was all i thought about for weeks afterwards; and since that time i have read numerous books on ufo���s and related topics.  i keep an extensive dream journal; and have had lucid dreams in the past.  on march 22, 1997 i had two out-of-body experiences.  i don���t know where i went but it was extraordinary and amazing.  i haven���t been able to repeat them since that time.
content.summary: Eight spheres traveled from west to east in-line, no noise, 300-500 ft altitude

content.detailedDescription:
i had gotten off work about 45 min. before this occurred, and had stepped out back to smoke and call a friend of mine. it was around 10:15pm and everyone was asleep, so i pulled my truck through the back yard to get closer to the back door for better phone reception (a wireless/land-line). after i was finished with both distractions i backed my truck to its original place and exited the vehicle. as i closed the door and took a few steps forward i looked ahead at the back door and noticed in my peripheral vision,  over head, a light that was bigger and brighter making it stand out from the surrounding stars with a halo around it. i stopped walking and noticed it was moving, going about the same speed as an airplane. i was only able to see it fly for about 6-10 seconds; when it stopped and seemed to be getting smaller (moving away from me), but not dimmer until it became not tiny but very small. after it lost about half its original size the halo went away making the objects shape more "crisp". although the objects shape was more crisp i could not discern any noticeable details from the object. the duration for the entire event was as follows: 5-8 seconds from the time i noticed till the time it stopped: no time passed during its stop. it instantly started getting smaller after it stopped: the object moved away from me, getting smaller, and not moving a degree in any direction for about 2-3 seconds and then it disappeared. the starting off size of the object including the bright halo around it was about the size of a dime held at arms length. the light in the center was a little less than half the size of its halo. there was absolutely no sound, and it was moving from the north to the south in a straight line. after i stood there for a few minutes trying to think of any thing else it could be, and making sure not to miss anything else, i started "moment to moment" reliving what just happened in my head. as i remembered the ufo stopping and moving dead away from me, and the way the halo cleared away from it, i thought the only reason for it clearing up was it was moving from a low, humid altitude to a higher, cooler altitude. but what i thought was strange was all the stars in the sky were perfectly clear as was the object the further away it moved from me, but if it was a halo caused by humidity and i was looking through the humid air at both the ufo and the stars should'nt everything of been foggy looking?

3. i thought the object was a plane that i just could'nt fully make out.
4. during the event my feelings were nothing more than curiously trying to figure out what it was. after the sighting i felt a little stunned, then more excited as i realized nothing i could think of other than a ufo could explain what i saw. then i started to think "what am i supposed to do"? after deciding to report the incident, i started recalling over and over every detail from every moment i saw the object. i have almost all ways believed in ufo's, so i was'nt scared or anything, i only wish i had a camera to take a picture, or a flash light to signal it or something.
content.summary: A foggy looking circular shaped object flew a straight line then stopped and flew straight away from me into space.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside with my wife to smoke a cigarette and looked up at the stars.  i noticed in the sw west sky in the direction of the oregon coast range a light similar to a satellite and pointed it out to my wife.  it was brighter than a satellite, appeared closer than one also, and was faster.  it traveled from sw to nw, appearing to follow the earths curvature.  after it passed the big dipper it paused and got brighter, almost as if it pointed it's light towards us.  similar to someone pointing a flashlight towards you.  the pause was only for a second and then it appeared to fly away.  not flying away as if it flew away in the distance, but straight up, as if it went into space, faded, and then disappeared.
content.summary: Bright light traveling across the sky like a satellite, but brighter, faster, and closer. then got brighter and flew into space

content.detailedDescription: I was vacationing in daytona beach sitting on the shore of the ocean july 24th 2011 at 3 in the morning. i started getting a creepy feeling about being in the ocean with sharks and stuff at night and was trying to figure out if they would be more active at night. after a lot of deliberation i decided to get out and go sit with the other people i went to the beach with. i was with my sister rachel, her friend kenley, and someone that was a friend of a friend named jess who lived an hour from this spot. all of us saw this. after i sat down with them, my sister started freaking out because a huge roach was running all over her legs. we were all laughing at here and i looked out over the ocean as we had been doing prior to that and noticed what at first appeared to be a lantern. it was a distant bright orange light that was pretty far off in the distance over the ocean. i thought it was some boat that was coming up closer to shore because a storm had just went through. i said out loud to everyone else, "what the hell is that?" and everyone just sat there staring at it. it slowly moved across the ocean and lined up straight with us which would have made this thing if floating on the ocean go against the current. it wasn't bobbing so it would had to have been a massive boat. but someone said something about how bright it was and almost as if on cue it seemed to get brighter. it started getting bigger and by the end of this part of the sighting it almost looked like the moon fell and started floating on the ocean. it was crescent shaped and had another piece right above it and looked like something was in front of it but it was fairly bright outside for it to be as late as it was and i didn't see anything near this thing. i attempted to take a picture of it but this thing wasn't picking up on my camera. it sat in front of us for quite some time before it started to lift in the air very slowly. when it lifted (about an inch from my perspective) off the water line it started shrinking rapidly and ended up the size of a star that you would normally see on a clear night. then in the blink of an eye it shot up into the sky. by the end of all this i was so overwhelmed that my eyes started watering and i couldn't say anything but, "what the hell was that!". all the ladies i was with started screaming and were as excited as me.
content.summary: Indescribable

content.detailedDescription: Driving west on devon ave,noticed a orange stare that was moving told my wife to pull over looked at it fly eraticaly for 5 minets ]i thpought it was a bag with a candel in it to make it fly up but when it went in the clouds i new it wasnt to high and it was flying to fast i tries to take a picture but my camrea was full this just happent it was flying west not aplain  no was helicopter no way it flew sort of zig zag from the noth coming south and then west
content.summary: Orang coller like jack o lantern

content.detailedDescription:
On july 4th, 2011 at around 10:00 p.M. my wife and i witnessed these orange balls flying over our house as we were observing fireworks in the front yard. we live in north east ohio. there were two. the first appeared before the second. the second appeared about 15 seconds after the first. they were moving south east and made abrupt turn south west. they were silent, and flying very low. they followed the same flight pattern. they were visible for three minutes. my mother witnessed the same objects flying over her house at the same time. she lives three miles away. she reported to me that when she saw them they were at about the same altitude and moving in the same direction as when my wife and i saw them.

i have never seen anything like what i saw until today july 26th, 2011. again i saw the same orange ball flying over my house at the same time 10:00 p.M. only one this time. it followed the same flight pattern as those that i witnessed on july 4th. this one was flying much higher however. it was visible for about 30 seconds. 

i have never believed in ufos. i can't believe that i am reporting this. when i witnessed what i did,i immediately knew they were ufos.
content.summary: Orange flaming spheres (3 sightings)

content.detailedDescription:
This 21 engine triangle at about 1000 ft altitude or lower with no sound at all.  (not even the sound of cutting air at the speed it was traveling)
at the time about 1139pm easter standard time as it traveled over my house at aprox. 500mph i had 15 seconds of view time and my son had about 8 seconds of view time.  we saw the craft so well we could identify a single power source attached to the 3 cylindrical housings containing 7 vents for directional propulsion venting blue flames or blue heat giving the appearance of 3 lights. possibly a plasma engine? however i have no explination how something of such mass could maintain current speed, altitude and silence.
content.summary: Saw the so called black triangle tonight!

content.detailedDescription:
We came out of a program at church at 8:09 pm july 26, 2011. my 9-year-old daughter spotted a bright object in the sky over the building, to our west. we watched it for a minute as we walked to our car. the kids got into the car and i stood watching this object advance towards us, going due east, at a steady speed. the object came into view as a metallic elongated shape, like a stick or a cigar or a rectangle. it was slender. it continued coming directly over us. size would be approximate, as i extend my arm fully, with my thumb and forefinger separated about 3/8th inch. i kept thinking it would blink like an airplane or would have some identifiable markings but i couldn't make them out like a regular aircraft. we see quite a few aircraft from milwaukee and chicago and minneapolis so we're familiar with the flight patterns. this object seemed to sail across the sky, at times glinting in the setting sun, and then we watched it disappear into the east-southeast towards lake michigan. 

about halfway through the sighting, directly above us, i was able to discern what looked like two wings out either side, like a double-wing or bi-plane aircraft. but this was bigger than any double-wing aircraft i had ever seen, and higher in sky than they would normally fly. this was confirmed by my 7-year-old son who also saw the craft. i asked him to draw what he saw and he showed a cross-type object, and then said, "but there was another part on top of it that i didn't know how to draw, like another wing." i thought, aha! yes, he saw that too.

my two daughters had similar experience. the 9-year-old saw it as a whitish-yellowish rectangular-type object, or rather two ends to the object, with a space in the center. one object held together by something in the center. my 16-year-old saw a rectangular object, two objects flying front to back, with a space in the center where the wings would be if it were an aircraft (only she didn't see wings), and she said both sections were lit up like incandenscent lights (yellowish). my 7-year-old son and i both saw this cross-type object, rectangular, with the two pieces, but we could see faint "wings" on it, like a bi-wing plane. it would be a safe guess to say the object was segmented.

others who came out of the building at the same time were also looking at this object as it moved. i made my kids get back out of the car to witness this object. at that point, a very large commercial-type jet (i'm conjecturing here since i'm not an expert in aircraft) appeared just to our southeast. the object continued to sail along in the sky and this jet seemed to bank away from it, to the southeast, like they were pretty close together in the sky. the object appeared to be above the jet but it seemed very close, like the jet was avoiding the larger, slender object. another mother said, "that's too close for my comfort," or something to that effect. that's when i realized there were others watching the object. the jet appeared as if out of nowhere and i was surprised it was so close to the ground, much closer than they usually get. but we have a fly-in locally this week so there may be a good explanation for why it was so close.

we continued watching the long object as it continued east, heading a bit southeast as it went. the jet had suddenly appeared and afterwards, nobody remembers seeing the jet leave the area, just that it appeared almost overhead, making noise, and then it was gone. my 9-year-old daughter said she heard the original object making a humming noise but i don't have the best hearing so i can't discount that. it was pretty high up there. 

we lost sight of the object about 8:13 pm cdt as it continued its steady path east-southeast. there appeared to be a small contrail in the area where we last saw the object.

i was initially not surprised to see an odd object in the sky due to the eaa (experimental aircraft association) fly-in at oshkosh this week, approximately 25 miles northeast from our location. i thought it was a glider but realized it was too high up to be a glider. then i thought it could be a satellite, but it was close enough to see: every satellite i've ever seen has been a bright dot in the sky at night but not during the day or even the brighter evening light. the cross-shape was interesting but the cross-wings were pretty hard to see and they didn't seem to be there the entire time, if that makes sense. it definitely was no plane. and the jet that showed up all of a sudden and then nobody remembered watching it fly away is troubling too. the long, slender object was not heading in the direction of the fly-in. 

this is a true and accurate account that my 3 children and i saw this evening. in addition, at least three others in the parking lot with us witnessed this object.
content.summary: Long object traveled steady speed across sky, west to southeast. commercial jet banked away from it.

content.detailedDescription: On monday, july 25th around 4:45 am, i left my apartment building which has an entrance on the beach next to the santa monica pier. i looked up and saw two bright lights over the ocean, just south of the pier. one light was very bright, sparkly and seemed to have color. the other one, to the left, was a bit fainter. i thought they were planets but then the fainter one quickly faded, as if it went further towards the ocean. then on tuesday, july 26th at around 4:30 am, as i again was leaving my building to ride my bike to the gym, i saw four bright lights to the left of the pier in a perfect vertical line. i stopped and stared because i had never seen four lights like this before. the brighter one was at the right corner and the other lights got progressively dimer. they other three lights started to fade so i took off on my bike on the road above the beach heading south. but i kept looking towards the lights and they seemed to be getting brighter. it was so early and no one was around to witness what i saw so i dismissed it as something i was seeing because it was so early and perhaps i was just tired. i had to get to the gym, so i didn't stick around to find a witness at this early hour. i took a picture with my iphone but it doesn't do it justice. tomorrow i will shoot a video if i see these lights again.
content.summary: Four bright, flashing lights in a diagonal pattern over the ocean in santa monica

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work , stuck in traffic.  i was traveling north on the 101 freeway, and something in the sky caught my eye. i thought it might be a small white plane, but then the sun shined on it, as it must have tilted a bit, and it had a silver metallic surface.  it was oval shaped, and i kept my eye on it as it traveled from south to north for about 3 to 5 seconds, then it just vanished into thin air!!!  i kept looking and looking for it, but it was gone!!!  this is my second sighting in three weeks, and i am stunned!!
content.summary: Silver metallic disc flying south of the 101 freeway

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were camping in evanston, wy.  the moon was not visible so this would be a good night to view the stars. just after sunset i was killing time by looking for familiar constellations and stars - i was lucky enough to see a satellite in a south to north orbit.  the north star was clearly visible and the big dipper was setting while cassiopeia was rising.  my wife and i had set out some lawn chairs to watch stars before going to bed.  the temperature was cool enough wear a light jacket.  about 10pm we were located in an area of trees that did limit our view somewhat but the view to the north was open so we placed our chairs in that direction.  after talking about the possibility of ufos for a while we were greeted by a flying star.  a few minutes later we both saw something very unusual.  four faint objects moving in a straight line appeared.  we both agreed that there was four faint objects - very much like faint stars flying in formation from east to west.  the formation was a line where three were exactly spaced while the forth was some distance away as if it was the fifth and the forth not visible (*space*space*spacespace*).  the formation appeared as i was scanning the sky - that is to say i did not see it move from the east but my eyes just noticed the movement about due north as i was scanning.  my wife saw the same objects at the same time - we both watched them move from east to west for several seconds - we lost sight of the objects the same way we found them.  the speed of the objects was much faster than the satellite i saw earlier in the evening - maybe three or four time as fast.  the speed and direction was very deliberate, consistent and did not waiver.  i did not notice any deviation of the background star field as the objects flew thought the night sky.  i heard no sonic booms or any other sound that could be attributed to the objects.  i could not calculate the size of any object nor if they were connected.  but, i can say, they fly formation  better than anything else i have ever seen!  they were headed somewhere for reason.  that night i expected dreams of ufos and aliens but i did no have any.  i felt no concern about the objects at any time.  i have a degree in astronomy and a former military pilot with extensive night experience.  i would have dismissed this occurrence as 'day dreaming' if i was the only one to see the objects.  but, my wife saw the exact same objects at the exact same time.  the objects that my wife and i saw have no corresponding relevance to anything we have ever seen - either man, bird or beast.
content.summary: String of very small lights in formation moving rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
Arrived at joshua tree national monument friday evening to camp and do some rockclimbing for the weekend. it was very windy and cold and the sun had set. we set up camp with a small 2-man tent (without windows)and were sitting inside discussing what to do about dinner since it was too windy to light the camp stove. 
we had only been in the tent about 10 minutes when a soft whirring (hard to describe) sound flew directly over the tent and stopped what sounded like 20 to 25 feet away. as we looked at each other, asking simultaneously "did you hear that", we could hear foot steps approaching from the direction the strange noise had stopped. they were clearly discernable as bipedal walking on the decomposing granite as it came toward the tent. the foot steps circled the tent twice and stopped at the zipper door and proceeded to sniff the entire zipper(the door was an inverted t). then nothing. i probably don't need to say we were thoroughly frightened out our wits. 
not exactly sure how long we sat listening but seemed like forever that we sat waiting for that door to open or at least hear more footsteps but we heard nothing. finally whispering to each other we decided to make a run for the car which was only 10 feet away.
we unzipped the door and ran on the count of three, jumped in the car and locked the doors. we turned on the lights and looked around and saw nothing. after we calmed down, we got out the flashlights and started looking around for anything including footprints, there were only ours from setting up the tent. we headed out the direction that the sound came from and the only thing we found was a set of three round depressions in the gravel approximately 10-12 feet apart in a triangular pattern, also with no footprints around them. 
don't really know what to think...
content.summary: This may be the wrong forum for this occurance but don't know what/where to report to.

content.detailedDescription:
These are photographs taken by my wife's friend taken in northern oregon i believe. she is not a big believer in ufoligy but i am, and when i saw the photographs i asked if i could have them. my wife got them from her friend for me. to me it looks like a fleet flying in formation and are cloaked in clouds. i want to know if there have been other reports such as this, and if it is a known technology possesed by the eti's (ability to create and memic movement of clouds as a disquise) or if this is more commonly known to be used by the arv's? 

or is this just a phenomenon recorded and understood as a cloud formation in our atmosphere to date?

i appreciate any feedback or speculation you may have.
content.summary: V shaped fleet with two craft bringing up the tail flying in formation, but cloaked in clouds?

content.detailedDescription: I walked out and sat on the back porch at 11:43 (i checked the time when i went back inside.) i saw first a bright flash of circular white light about the size of a 50 cent piece if you held it up at the sky, followed by a second flash at a 45 degree agle slightly below the first one. it was in the ne sky. this was different than any shooting star i've seen. there was no tail and no sound. i have no idea what it was, but i haven't seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Two subsequent flashes of white light cascading downward in the ne sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Was shooting pics of jets and chemtrails. found this orb in two of the pictures after downloading them from the camera. have made several sightings of various descriptions over the years and have spoken with my local mufon investigator, mike.

all the pictures and enhancements to show the ufo are compiled in a video at youtube, titled, heavy chemtrails and orb ufos in the ohio valley july 2011.Wmv 

search that title in youtube or search this video link the same way- watch?V=c9ybti7x6bk
content.summary: Found ufos in two pics of a jet and chemtrails

content.detailedDescription: It was april 7th, 2011 around 7:00 a.M.  it caught my eye out of my office window because it was as black as anything i ever saw and was moving real slow due south, while the clouds were all moving due east.  after about ten minutes of moving due south it turned and headed due east until i could no longer see it.  it didn���������t make any weird moves or anything but the intense black hue and going across the prevailing wind made me think twice.  i have no idea what it was but i took some pictures, none of which came out very clear.  but when you zoom in on them there are weird colors and shapes.  hmmmm.
content.summary: Strange object in sky

2 objects coming from the south moving to the east, there was a gap between the 2 objects the 2nd object was at the same height but about , if you stick your hand out 4 inches away from the first one,

content.detailedDescription: Blue skies object moved toward large puffy cloud slowly entering,it was brighter than the cloud itself.No sound at all. never came out of cloud.I was on foot walking to store.I was in complete awe.
content.summary: White 1000 ft. no wings no windows no lights moving slowly cigar shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my yard around 4ish pm taking pics of some military osprey planes (2) that kept flying over all day back and forth. they were cool looking and took pics for my hubby. at one point i noticed a black thing moving in the sky. so, i took a pic of it. then about 5 minutes later i was taking a pic of trails from a jet just to see what it would look like on film. and then a few minutes later the planes came back and both flew very low down my street. i went inside after that to develop pics in my computer program and noticed black and white orbs in all the pics. not sure what they were. you may have to put these pics in your own computer programs and sharpen to see the white orbs. the black ones were obvious. one of the pics came out dark, but i lightened it up as it was a pic of one of the osprey planes coming over and i really saw a lot of white orbs in the pic. that's it. i will attach pics.
i would like to send more pics, but there is only room for 3. contact me if you want to see more.
content.summary: Saw white and black orbs while photographing military osprey planes, jet stream trails and  small plane.

content.detailedDescription:
just about 1 am i was walking out to my car to get something. as i was walking down the drive i looked up in the sky. i like to check the stars and see how many i can see so i always look up. i got about half way down the drive i saw a bright red light. it was not flashing but moving in the exact direction i was walking above me. i did not hear anyting and the in the direction it was moving it was going rather quickly.

 it did not appear to be an airplane, but could of been,  and as it moved , from north to south, i lost view of it through some trees. normal navigation lights on most aircraft can be seen as blinking. some blue and some red or both. this red light was seemingly the entire craft and it was very bright red.With smaller aircraft you can hear them and with larger ones , the sound seems to follow shortly after you see them as they are so high up that it takes time for the sound to catch up.There was no sound with this. this is what prompted me to make this post.It was super quiet and fast.

prior to going out to my car i was inside watching a film. not doing anything else. i went to retrieve a bag of chips . i have seen strange things before and have even made a post here before. as it turned out the post i made prior , others had seen a similar object in the state to the north and south of me. both had similar discriptions of what i also saw. i do see the importance of making such posts as it can validate others possible sightings as well.
content.summary: I just saw  a bright red light streak across the sky.No sound and too fast for a normal aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were driving east in the country when we saw a bright light streaking across the sky.  we both exclaimed that it looked like it was angled towards the ground and would crash.  we thought it might be an airplane, but it was shaped like a cone with red lights at the point in front and yellow in back.  it was very fast and we watched it for less than 10 seconds.  as it got closer to the ground we became alarmed that it was crashing but then it disappeared.  we pulled over and got out of the jeep to see if it would reappear or to see if it crashed, but it never reappeared. we were a little creeped out at the sudden way it disappeared.  it was very close to the ground, which is why we thought at first that it was an airplane landing.  but there are no airports around the area and it was going way too fast. we heard no noise while in the jeep or when we got out.
content.summary: Speeding across the sky angled downwards and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Camping last week at bennett springs and nightly we would witness large bright lights that would rise from  the hillside.Appeared very large and round at first then they would morph into a blinking cluster of orange /white blinking lights that would pass overhead. most were orange although one that appeared was large and very bright white in color..
i mentioned to my son  that it was strange we never saw any air traffic during the daylight hours .At which time we both looked up and he spotted a large white cylinder approx. 1000 feet above our truck.No wings on the cylinder ,we watched for a few seconds  and after  a while it released a puff of white smoke or haze and disappeared !!! 
no sound accompanied the sightings .We watched them fly over us through night vision goggles and they looked like an orange flickering light that would go  off  and on quickly almost like a shutter on a camera .
content.summary: Multiple sightings nightly from campground.Bright lights appear from hillside then shoot off.One daaytime sighting of large white cylinder.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and son were in the pool in our backyard. i was in the house at the time. my son looked up and said "what's that?" causing my wife to look up. she saw a white capsule shaped (cigar-shaped) object in the southeastern sky and noted that there were no wings and it traversed the sky in a steady pace until it passed beyond our house out of view. there was no noise as it flew. a few minutes later she heard jet(s) flying but could not determine where they were at.
fifteen minutes later, i came out to the pool and my wife told me about what she saw so i kept a steady eye out in the section of sky that she had found it. ten minutes later, i spied another white object sans wings in the same section of sky and watched it until it was completely out of view to the south. i noted what appeared to be an exhaust trail before it disappeared but my eyes could have been playing tricks on me, having been staring into the sky for so long.
fifteen minutes later, we got out of the pool and were on our deck when i saw the white capsule object again but, directly below it, there appeared to be a separate black boomerang shaped craft (almost reminiscent of a flying wing in shape). we lost track of the white object as we focused all of our attention on the black wing. it headed north and was making a quick turn to the left and then almost made a figure eight type movement until it was beyond our view. it appeared to be traveling at high speeds (much faster than the white capsule). a moment later we saw what appeared to be a plane or jet coming out of the eastern sky heading toward the west. we were unsure if it was a jet that was scrambled to intercept or if it was just a coincidence.
content.summary: White capsule shaped object with black boomerang shaped object in the northeastern sky
